Wellington City Council spent $43,000 on Mayor Tory Whanau’s hunt for leaker https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-city-council-spent-43000-on-mayor-tory-whanaus-hunt-for-leaker/K7MXNDJT5ZFHRFPDIAIR3FM6VU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-city-council-spent-43000-on-mayor-tory-whanaus-hunt-for-leaker/K7MXNDJT5ZFHRFPDIAIR3FM6VU/ Georgina CampbellThe cost of high-profile lawyer Linda Clark's investigation has been revealed. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 00:29:53 +0000 Wellington Mayor Tory Whanau launched the probe after a complaint councillors leaked commercially sensitive information about a deal to buy the land underneath the shut-up Reading Cinema complex on Courtenay Place. Photo /Mark Mitchell
